dashboard.label: Asset Inventory
dashboard.description: Monitors local hosts for listening ports.

search.query: index="osquery" source="/var/log/osquery/osqueryd.*" name=* snapshot{}.remote_address!=127.0.0.1 |dedup "decorations.Hostname" |table _time, "decorations.Hostname", "decorations.Host UUID", "decorations.IP Addresses", "snapshot{}.remote_address", "snapshot{}.remote_port", "snapshot{}.name" | rename _time AS "Time", "decorations.Hostname" AS Hostname, "decorations.Host UUID" AS UUID, "decorations.IP Addresses" AS "Source IP Address (v4)","snapshot{}.remote_address" AS "Remote Address" "snapshot{}.remote_port" AS "Remote Port", "snapshot{}.name" AS "Service Name"

index="osquery" source="/var/log/osquery/osqueryd.*" name="pack_network-connections_linux_process_listening_port" | dedup "decorations.Hostname" |table "decorations.Hostname", "decorations.Host UUID", "decorations.IP Addresses", "snapshot{}.port", "snapshot{}.name" | rename "decorations.Hostname" AS Hostname, "decorations.Host UUID" AS UUID, "decorations.IP Addresses" AS "IP Address (v4)", "snapshot{}.port" AS "Port Number", "snapshot{}.name" AS "Service Name"
